total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the positions of the number 1 in the input grid.
Q2: Calculate the distance between each pair of 1s in the grid.
Q3: Identify the midpoint between each pair of 1s.
Q4: Place the number 2 at the midpoint positions identified in Q3.
